availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ralph Stafford (Johnson County, Kentucky, attorney and farmer)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda Stafford. Father of Sarah L. Stafford, Susan Stafford, Sofronia Stafford, and John Stafford. Attorney in Johnson County in 1860. Farmer in Johnson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 153.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 9th Congressional District, Johnson County, Vol. 3 of 3, October 1863, p. 144, p. 147 of 175 of microfilm), (Accessed via ancestry.com on August 13, 2020).
